trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to peek the current message in a queue, or the next message.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否要查看目前的訊息在佇列中或下一個訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use the PeekAction enumeration with <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%29> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%29> to indicate whether you want to peek at the current message in the queue, or the next message.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 PeekAction 列舉<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%29>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%29>來指出您是否想要查看目前的訊息在佇列中或下一個訊息。</xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.Peek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%29> </xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.BeginPeek%28System.TimeSpan%2CSystem.Messaging.Cursor%2CSystem.Messaging.PeekAction%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.AsyncCallback%29>

trans-unit.source: Peek at the current message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視佇列中目前的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Peek at the next message in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 窺視佇列中的下一個訊息。
